attributes.action: Ensure that the Job centres in Feltham, Sheperds Bush & Kilburn remain open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I discovered today that we are allready in the consultation period, of a proposal to close these Job Centres.  I understand this to save money, since helping the unemployed back into work as quickly as possibly increases income tax revenue, how does this argument stand up?  Closing this job centre will not save money in the long term and will make finding work much harder for those people who have no wish to be unemployed, but who need the support of a well staffed local facility.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ensure that the Job centres in Feltham, Sheperds Bush & Kilburn remain open."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19367


Prime Minister's Office
